title: The System - Sweat (1983) [FLAC]
description:
"Sweat" by The System

1 Sweat
2 You Are in My System
3 It's Passion
4 Stand Up and Cheer
5 I Won't Let Go
6 Go for What U Know
7 Now I Am Electric

Originally released in 1983

Packaged by ]Hellion[
Source: CD
Format: FLAC

Review by Ron Wynn (allmusic.com)
Mic Murphy and David Frank created a new group mixing funk and technology in
the early '80s. While the debut wasn't a huge pop hit, it made an immediate
impact in the R&B community. The synthesized backbeat of "You Are In My
System" rose up the charts and made Murphy and Frank the hot R&B production
tandem of the day. The rest of Sweat wasn't quite as successful, but it had
already launched them into stardom.
